text:
Good news! Our Review on Mechanisms of action of #hydroxychloroquine and #chloroquine: implications for #rheumatology is now #free to access!

Please share, as the mechanisms are relevant to all uses of these drugs #COVID19 #covid4rheum #covid4md 

https://t.co/OOJRkINIIJ https://t.co/wbZCwNpFZr
